title: Rage Comics: The Ghost Story
alternative_title: Baozou Kongbu Gushi, 暴走恐怖故事第一季
description: Baozou Kongbu GushiSynopsis: All new Rage Comics style of horror guaranteed to make you laugh til you’re drenched in cold sweat! Tonight… whose turn is it? Friendly Reminder: Little kids, please watch in the company of strangers!Regarding ‘The Conjuring’: The Chinese title of the Conjuring is招魂 (Zhao Hun) which translates to something like ‘summoning spirits’.
